00037 class rigid_align_t{
00038 public:
00039 
00041   rigid_align_t()
00042   { init(); }
00043 
00045   rigid_align_t(const rigid_align_t &other)
00046   { 
00047     init();
00048     do_copy(other); 
00049   }
00050 
00052   const rigid_align_t &
00053   operator=(const rigid_align_t &other)
00054   {
00055     if(&other != this){
00056       do_copy(other);
00057     }
00058     return *this;
00059   }
00060 
00062   virtual ~rigid_align_t()
00063   { ; }
00064 
00067   inline bool 
00068   operator== (const rigid_align_t &b) const
00069   {
00070     if(score != b.score) return false;
00071     for(size_t i = 0; i < 9; ++i)
00072       if(R[i] != b.R[i]) return false;
00073     for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00074       if(T[i] != b.T[i]) return false;
00075     return true;
00076   }
00077 
00080   inline bool 
00081   operator!= (const rigid_align_t &b) const
00082   {
00083     if(score != b.score) return true;
00084     for(size_t i = 0; i < 9; ++i)
00085       if(R[i] != b.R[i]) return true;
00086     for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00087       if(T[i] != b.T[i]) return true;
00088     return false;
00089   }
00090

00092   write_score_fields(std::ostream& out, const uint orient_num,
00093                      const bool wrote_ligs, const std::string& ext_SF_id_in,
00094                      const std::string& struct_id, 
00095                      const std::string& lig_id) const ;

00098   write_score_fields(std::ostream& out) const;

00160   my_float_t tier1_score;      
00161   my_float_t score;            
00162   std::vector<my_float_t> terms;
00163   std::vector<my_float_t> ext_scores;  
00164   std::vector<bool> frag_atoms_flags;  
00165   my_float_t R[9];       
00166   my_float_t T[3];       
00167   Quaternion Q;
00168   mol2File *frag_file;   
00169   std::vector<bool> match_print;
00170 
00171   // Added for prototype of hbond caps - used in only SimSite3DPy as this point
00172   my_float_t hb_caps_score;
00173   std::string hb_caps_match_print;
00174 
00175 private:
00176 
00177   void
00178   init()
00179   {
00180     score = my_float_max;
00181     tier1_score = my_float_max;
00182     frag_file = 0;
00183     hb_caps_score = my_float_max;
00184   }
00185 
00187   void
00188   do_copy(const rigid_align_t &other)
00189   {
00190     tier1_score = other.tier1_score;
00191     score = other.score;
00192     terms = other.terms;
00193     ext_scores = other.ext_scores;
00194     frag_atoms_flags = other.frag_atoms_flags;
00195     std::copy(other.R, other.R + 9, R);
00196     std::copy(other.T, other.T + 3, T);
00197     Q = other.Q;
00198     // It can be very dangerous to copy the pointer for frag file, at the
00199     // present this is only done in the scoring section and the local copy
00200     // of this class is tossed after insertion into a container
00201     frag_file = other.frag_file;
00202     match_print = other.match_print;
00203 
00204     hb_caps_score = other.hb_caps_score;
00205     hb_caps_match_print = other.hb_caps_match_print; 
00206   }
00207

00217 class ScoreMapBase{
00218 public:
00219 
00222 
00225   ScoreMapBase(const SearchParameters& params)
00226   {
00227     A_external_SF = 0;
00228     A_write_ligands = params.write_ligands;
00229     A_scratch_dir = params.scratch_dir;
00230     A_prot_lig_score = params.do_internal_prot_lig_score;
00231   }
00232 
00234   virtual ~ScoreMapBase()
00235   {
00236     if(A_external_SF) delete(A_external_SF);
00237     A_external_SF = 0;
00238     ext_SF_id = "";
00239     A_scratch_dir = "";
00240   }
00241 
00250   bool 
00251   set_external_scoring_method(const std::string sf_name,
00252                               std::string method_name)
00253   {
00254     std::string src_fname = "ScoreMapBase.H";
00255 
00256     // Read system scoring functions file
00257     std::ifstream in;
00258     if(!open_ifstream(in, sf_name)) return false;
00259     std::string str;
00260     bool first_method = true;
00261     while(std::getline(in, str)){
00262       if(str[0] == '%' || str[0] == '#') continue;
00263   
00264       strip_trailing_comments(&str, "%#");
00265       std::vector<std::string> toks; 
00266       string_tok(str, &toks, ',');
00267       if(toks.size() != 3){
00268         bad_file_line(src_fname, "set_external_scoring_method", sf_name, str);
00269         continue; 
00270       }
00271 
00272       // The default method is the one listed first in the external scoring 
00273       // function file
00274       if(first_method && method_name == "default"){
00275         method_name = toks[1];
00276         first_method = false;
00277       }
00278   
00279       // toks[0]: The user specified prot-lig sf identifier (on commandline)
00280       // toks[1]: The internal scoring function type -- class to construct
00281       // toks[2]: The prot-lig sf cmdline with variables for prot and lig file
00282       //          names
00283       if(toks[1] == method_name){
00284         ext_SF_id = toks[0];
00285         if(method_name == "NONE"){
00286           A_external_SF = 0;
00287           return true;
00288         }else if(toks[1] == "DrugScore"){
00289           A_external_SF = new DrugScoreInterface(toks[2]);
00290           if(!A_external_SF->fail()) return true;
00291         }else if(toks[1] == "SFCscore"){
00292           A_external_SF = new SFCscoreInterface(toks[2]);
00293           if(!A_external_SF->fail()) return true;
00294         }else{
00295           std::cout << "Warning:  Unknown external scoring function \""
00296                     << toks[0] << "\" skipping . . . \n";
00297         }
00298       }
00299     }
00300   
00301     if(!A_write_ligands && A_external_SF){
00302       err_msg(src_fname, "set_external_scoring_method",
00303               "Using a prot-lig scoring function requires writing the ligand files");
00304       return false;
00305     }
00306   
00307     if(A_external_SF && A_external_SF->fail()){
00308       delete(A_external_SF);
00309       A_external_SF = 0;
00310       std::ostringstream ostr;
00311       ostr << "Unable to initialize the external scoring function named "
00312            << method_name;
00313       err_msg(src_fname, "set_external_scoring_method", ostr.str(), std::cerr);
00314       return false;
00315     }
00316   
00317     std::ostringstream ostr;
00318     ostr << "Unable to find an external scoring function in " << sf_name
00319          << " named " << method_name;
00320     err_msg(src_fname, "set_external_scoring_method", ostr.str(), std::cerr);
00321     return false;
00322   }
00323   
00325 
00333   template<class align_mmap_iter> bool
00334   run_external_scoring_method(align_mmap_iter a_beg, align_mmap_iter a_end,
00335                               const std::string &prot_fname,  
00336                               const std::string &struct_id, 
00337                               const std::string &output_dir)
00338   {
00339     if(!A_external_SF) return false;
00340 
00341     uint cnt = 1;
00342     std::string prefix = output_dir + "/ligand_fragments/" + struct_id + "_";
00343 
00344     for(align_mmap_iter align = a_beg; align != a_end; ++align, ++cnt){
00345       std::ostringstream tmp;
00346       tmp << std::setfill('0') << std::setw(5) << cnt << "_f.mol2";
00347       A_external_SF->score(prot_fname, prefix + tmp.str(),
00348                            &(align->second->ext_scores));
00349     }
00350     return true;
00351   }
00352 
00354   void 
00355   get_ext_SF_names(std::vector<std::string>* names)
00356   { A_external_SF->sf_names(names); }
00357

00360   bool A_write_ligands;  
00361   bool A_prot_lig_score; 
00362   std::string ext_SF_id;  
00363 
00364 private:
00365   ExternalScoringFunction* A_external_SF; 
00366 
00367 };
